title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Beijing, China
description:
Bring your coding craftsman attitude and laptops to join us for fun! :-D 
Agenda 
9 - 9:30am : arrival, drinks and snacks
 9:30 - 9:50am : welcome, introductions, explanation of the problem
 9:50 - 10:35am : Session #1
 10:35 - 10:50am : retrospective, break
 10:50 - 11:35am : Session #2
 11:35 - 11:50am : retrospective, break
 11:50 - 1:00pm : lunch, socializing
 1:00 - 1:45pm : Session #3
 1:45 - 2:00pm : retrospective, break
 2:00 - 2:45pm : Session #4
 2:45 - 3:00pm : retrospective, break
 3:00 - 3:45pm : Session #5
 3:45 - 4:00pm : retrospective, break
 4:00 - 4:45pm : Session #6
 4:45 - 5:00pm : retrospective, break
 5:00 - 5:30pm : Closing circle
